title: The association of the princes of France with the protestations and declarations of their allegeance to the King. Also a discourse vpon the surrendry of the seales into the Kings hands by M. du Vaiz [sic].
author: Du Vair, Guillaume, 1556-1621.
publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for William Barret,
notes: M. du Vaiz = Guillaume Du Vair.
"A remonstrance of the princes, to the French King", D1r-E3r, is signed: Cæsar de Vendosme. Henry de Lorraine, Duke of Mayenne. Henry de la Tour, Duke of Bouillon.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-E⁴.
Quire D is signed C and paginated 13-20.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
